modName: Instant Destructive Spell and Cloak fix for legendary version
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=#8e7cc3]I recently found that many instant destructive spell mod in nexus is out of date.they didn't work on legendary version. so I made my new one for legendary version(it can work in any version,i assume.) 
Also I discover the cloak spell didn't benefit from magnitude.so I decide to change it.
[/color]
[/size][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=4]Features:
1.all destrictive spell are instantly cast except rune.
2.fix the problem that flame/frost/lightning cloak didn't benefit from the spell magnitude.[/size][/color][/font]

[color=#00ff00][size=3]Compatibility:
This mod only modify the charge time of each spell and magic effect of cloak. If should be not compatible with other mod that modify spell cast style.but ok with any mod that modify perks. magnitude.skill level for magnitude..etc.In fact, I recommande to combine a  skill level-magnitude mod to use.
I have tested it for nearly 30 hours and i don't see problem by now.
[/size][/color]
author: Song the Forest
